sn22.10:1.4: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitasmim rupasmim anapekkho hoti;
sn22.10:1.6: paccuppannassa rupassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn22.10:1.12: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitasmim vinnanasmim anapekkho hoti;
sn22.10:1.14: paccuppannassa vinnanassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti”ti.
